answers.answer: I did it once a week with my last pregnancy to monitor contractions. She also had me do kick counts while I was there. For me it started because I ended up sick in hospital and was having contractions, which they stopped, but had to be monitored after that.
How many weeks were u when u started going? I am currently 30 wk and 4 days. I haven't any contractions yet or not any that I could really be concerned with.

I have had to go once a week since 33 weeks I started BC my baby is a lot bigger than he should be at that stage n know reason like diabetes so I get monitored for contractions n him for stress I'm now 37 weeks I'm also already high risk BC this will be my fourth c section
Yes, I was diagnosed a year ago, but since I been pregnant my blood pressure has been oddly normal. Bottom number between 78-80. That actually maybe why.
Ya that's what m y dr said with my first i had to cause of my bp issues

question: Starting fetal monitoring every two weeks for an hour. I never had to go through this before with my other two. Does anyone know why they normally suggest this?
title: fetal monitoring
